<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on what register list has been picked during frame lowering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;PopDesc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getDesc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstNonDeclaredOp = PopDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0ca904e64ee29c8812ed34e632d3c947">getNumOperands</a>() +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                PopDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0213025f97776e13649b1136bae07524">NumImplicitUses</a> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                PopDesc.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc/#a0d45da21f713463669876b3efeaeb95a">NumImplicitDefs</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = FirstNonDeclaredOp; i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PopRetBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a713eab58694282971c413a0d6de5975c">add</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOperand(i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NextI-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Search for last assignment to a0 and if possible use ret&#95;val slot of POP to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store return value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ac6bfa516458b5082ed19852b929836f1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ac6bfa516458b5082ed19852b929836f1">RISCVPushPopOpt::adjustRetVal</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#abada92f8cd2854d2b747f14c4a7be0ed">MachineBasicBlock::reverse&#95;iterator</a> RE = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getParent()-&gt;rend();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Track which register units have been modified and used between the POP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insn and the last assignment to register a0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a347113dba77ab072347fdd6a5e4a876f">ModifiedRegUnits</a>.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ab12f0fa00bf98dae22174e01baa897ff">UsedRegUnits</a>.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since POP instruction is in Epilogue no normal instructions will follow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after it. Therefore search only previous ones to find the return value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#abada92f8cd2854d2b747f14c4a7be0ed">MachineBasicBlock::reverse&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0270bdca4aeb43f39bf91c900a398057">next&#95;nodbg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>.getReverse(), RE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != RE; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0270bdca4aeb43f39bf91c900a398057">next&#95;nodbg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, RE)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OperandPair = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ab187916d4d9b27e99631d7821267dd0a">TII</a>-&gt;isCopyInstrImpl(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DestReg = OperandPair-&gt;Destination-&gt;getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Source = OperandPair-&gt;Source-&gt;getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DestReg == RISCV::X10 &amp;&amp; Source == RISCV::X0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update modified / used register units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregunits/#a06c3c14971a6414e21bf3a0a2652de0f">LiveRegUnits::accumulateUsedDefed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a347113dba77ab072347fdd6a5e4a876f">ModifiedRegUnits</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ab12f0fa00bf98dae22174e01baa897ff">UsedRegUnits</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a9ae4b2c7ac3ea57ae3425292f4c8d0d4">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a0 was modified or used, there is no possibility</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of using ret&#95;val slot of POP instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a347113dba77ab072347fdd6a5e4a876f">ModifiedRegUnits</a>.available(RISCV::X10) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ab12f0fa00bf98dae22174e01baa897ff">UsedRegUnits</a>.available(RISCV::X10))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If frame pointer elimination has been disabled, abort to avoid breaking the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Fn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#ab1fb67187fc37e569cc5171cbebba873">Options</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions/#aad0fc1de8197ddf2c49346c5d92a2bec">DisableFramePointerElim</a>(Fn))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ab187916d4d9b27e99631d7821267dd0a">TII</a> = Subtarget-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvsubtarget/#ad1484b3b6dbf33deb1c526d456f1d256">getInstrInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Resize the modified and used register unit trackers.  We do this once</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// per function and then clear the register units each time we determine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct return value for the POP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a347113dba77ab072347fdd6a5e4a876f">ModifiedRegUnits</a>.init(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a9ae4b2c7ac3ea57ae3425292f4c8d0d4">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : Fn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end() &amp;&amp; NextI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NextI-&gt;getOpcode() == RISCV::PseudoRET)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#a9c82d545821ce74a71125df227cde299">usePopRet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>, NextI, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-riscvpushpopoptimizer-cpp-/riscvpushpopopt/#ac6bfa516458b5082ed19852b929836f1">adjustRetVal</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// createRISCVPushPopOptimizationPass - returns an instance of the</span></CodeLine>
